Name: Catholic Church Archdiocese of Canberra and Goulburn

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm by appointment; closed weekends and public holidays. Reference assistance available in person. No copying services.

About.Access: Prior approval of application by letter from Archbishop or Vicar-General required. Proof of identity required.

About.Major holdings: Catholic Archdiocese of Canberra and Goulburn Correspondence and Minutes 1867-1995

Contact.Street address: Diocesan Chancery, Favier House, 1 Ballumbir Street, Braddon 2601
